title: Add GitHub Copilot instructions
description: Create .github/copilot-instructions.md with project-specific guidance for Copilot. Document coding standards and patterns Copilot should follow.

title: Add Cursor configuration
description: Create .cursorrules file with project-specific rules for Cursor AI. Include coding standards, preferred patterns, and project context.

title: Add project-specific skills
description: Create custom slash commands in .claude/commands/ or skills in .claude-plugin/ for common project workflows like building, testing, and deploying.

title: Add AWS Kiro configuration
description: Create .kiro/ directory with specs and steering files for AWS Kiro agent. Define project requirements and agent behavior guidelines.

title: Add Aider configuration
description: Create .aider.conf.yml with model preferences and .aiderignore to exclude files. Configure aider for optimal performance with this codebase.

title: Agent Onboarding
description: Configure AI agents for this repository. Complete these tasks to set up agent configurations for Claude, Cursor, Kiro, Aider, and GitHub Copilot.

title: Initialize Claude Code configuration
description: Run `claude` in this directory to create CLAUDE.md with project-specific instructions. This file helps Claude understand your codebase architecture, coding conventions, and key patterns.
